rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming space designed in Scandinavian style with minimalist decor. It serves as the transition from the courtyard to the main living areas.
rooms.vastu_note: Faces east or north for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area featuring open-plan design with ample natural light from large windows. Scandinavian design elements include neutral colors and clean lines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, functional kitchen with minimalist Scandinavian features. Integrated storage and work surfaces ensure efficiency.
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned adjacent to the living room for activity flow; avoid direct alignment with the entrance.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Studio
rooms.description: A flexible studio space that can be used as a home office or relaxation area. Open concept design integrates Scandinavian simplicity.
rooms.vastu_note: Optimally placed for energy circulation and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Small bedroom designed to accommodate guests comfortably. Features built-in storage following Scandinavian design principles.
rooms.vastu_note: Located in a quieter section of the ground floor.

openings.description: Large entry door with Scandinavian simplicity and robust construction. Provides access from the central courtyard to the living area.
openings.vastu_note: Aligned with north-east for positive flow.

openings.description: Passages leading from the courtyard to different parts of the house, ensuring natural light and ventilation.
openings.vastu_note: Multiple openings ensure balanced air circulation.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: An outdoor swimming pool integrated into the landscape design. It adds recreational value while keeping with Scandinavian aesthetics.
additional_features.location: Behind the main living area adjacent to the garden courtyard.

additional_features.name: Central Courtyard
additional_features.description: A landscaped open space that acts as a central hub for family gatherings, ensuring fresh air and natural light in line with Vastu principles.
additional_features.vastu_note: Centrally located to promote positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity. Features a walk-in closet and an attached en-suite bathroom.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed towards the north for optimal energy.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: Bedroom allocated for family members. Minimalist design with functional storage solutions.
rooms.vastu_note: Located in a quiet corner of the floor.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: Large bathroom designed to serve multiple family members. Scandinavian fixtures and finishes are used.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in a location that avoids direct alignment with the entrance.

openings.description: A well-designed staircase connecting ground and first floors. It incorporates Scandinavian design elements for safety and style.

rooms.name: Terrace Garden
rooms.description: An open roof space designed as a terrace garden. Offers panoramic views and serves as an extension of the living space, ideal for relaxation.
rooms.vastu_note: East facing to capture morning sunlight.

openings.description: Secure access point from the staircase to the roof terrace.
